entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
